Disembrangling Programming

The simple life of a web developer — by Paul Craciunoiu (About)

My list of Firefox add-ons

UPDATE (27 Feb 2010) BarTab is an awesome extension.

  • BarTab
  • Better Gmail 2
  • Dummy Lipsum
  • Firebug
  • Fission
  • Gmail Notifier
  • Hide Menubar - Now part of Firefox 3.6
  • Jetpack (only Mozilla specific jetpacks yet)
  • Live HTTP headers
  • Personas - Now part of Firefox 3.6, but I keep the addon
  • Read It Later
  • Tabs Open Relative - Now part of Firefox 3.6
  • Weave
  • Web Developer
  • Yahoo! Mail Notifier
  • YSlow

Other potentially useful that I haven’t installed:

  • Platypus
  • Dust Me Selectors

I work as a web developer for Mozilla, with main focus on Django, Python, and PHP. Occasionally, I write tutorials or post other information I find interesting.

I enjoy doing freelance work for other websites, mostly non-profits. If you're interested in my services, contact me through one of the links below.
